title: Jan 10 - Quest Data Cleanup & Index Issue
entries: [0001] 22:05 | Identified merge side-effect: DATA structure/screens and panels drifted out of sync.
[0002] 22:12 | Investigated why some quest items were unreadable under QUESTS: they were log-shaped (entries[]) not quest-shaped (objectives[]).
[0003] 22:18 | Converted quest_006 and quest_007 into true quest format (title/description/objectives/status) so they can be checkable.
[0004] 22:24 | Detected new issue: quest_001.json not displaying in QUESTS list despite existing file.
[0005] 22:33 | Next action set: verify index filename/path consistency (quest_index vs quests_index), and ensure loader + index match so all quests render.
